metadata.title: iBrowe | Privacy-First Browser
metadata.description: A privacy-focused browser that puts you first

Hero.title: iBrowe - The Browser That Cares About You
Hero.description: The ultimate ad-free browser that's safe from scammers. Just switch to iBrowe!

EdgeComparison.title: iBrowe vs Edge
EdgeComparison.subtitle: Microsoft Edge is the successor to Internet Explorer and is the world's third most used browser (and second on desktop). But this is mostly because it's the default browser on Windows devices. Few people choose to switch to Edge on their own. While Edge has some good features and is optimized for Windows, when it comes to privacy, performance, and important features, Edge is missing a lot. Let's compare them.
EdgeComparison.privacyTitle: Is iBrowe more private than Edge?
EdgeComparison.privacyDescription: Microsoft is an example of 'Big Tech' and one of the world's most valuable companies. While most of its profits come from selling PCs and software like Windows, advertising is also a massive revenue source. And those ads are mostly found in Edge (and the Bing search engine). Edge tracks you across the web and collects as much data as possible. Microsoft 'monetizes' this data in the form of highly targeted ads. For Microsoft, Edge is about advertising and profit. Meanwhile, iBrowe blocks almost all attempts to track you:
EdgeComparison.privacyConclusion: In short, Edge is built for tracking. It allows creepy ads, trackers, cookies, and more to follow you around the web, record everything you do, and link that activity directly to you. All without your knowledge or consent. Meanwhile, iBrowe is private by default.
EdgeComparison.featuresTitle: Does iBrowe have more features than Edge?
EdgeComparison.featuresDescription: Both iBrowe and Edge are built on the open-source Chromium browser engine (the same one used in other browsers like Chrome, Opera, and Vivaldi). So you can expect similar looks and functions. But when it comes to things beyond those similarities, iBrowe has many customizations that Edge can't compete with.
EdgeComparison.featuresComparison: Let's look at the comparison by quality of results and transparency:

DuckDuckGoComparison.title: iBrowe Search vs DuckDuckGo
DuckDuckGoComparison.subtitle: DuckDuckGo is a privacy-focused search engine that doesn't track its users. While this is a great start, iBrowe Search goes even further by providing a complete privacy solution that protects you across the entire web, not just during search.
DuckDuckGoComparison.privacyTitle: Is iBrowe Search more private than DuckDuckGo?
DuckDuckGoComparison.privacyDescription: DuckDuckGo has built its reputation on privacy, and it's true that they don't track your searches. However, their privacy protection is limited to the search experience itself. Once you click on a search result, you're on your own. iBrowe Search, on the other hand, provides comprehensive privacy protection:
DuckDuckGoComparison.privacyConclusion: While DuckDuckGo is a good choice for private search, iBrowe Search offers a more complete privacy solution that protects you not just during search, but across your entire browsing experience.
DuckDuckGoComparison.featuresTitle: Does iBrowe Search have more features than DuckDuckGo?
DuckDuckGoComparison.featuresDescription: Both iBrowe Search and DuckDuckGo prioritize privacy, but iBrowe Search offers additional features that enhance your browsing experience while maintaining privacy.

GoogleComparison.title: iBrowe Search vs Google
GoogleComparison.subtitle: Google is the world's most popular search engine, but it comes at a cost to your privacy. iBrowe Search offers a private alternative that doesn't track your searches or collect your personal data.
GoogleComparison.privacyTitle: Is iBrowe Search more private than Google?
GoogleComparison.privacyDescription: Google's business model is built on collecting and monetizing user data. Every search you make, every website you visit, and every click you make is tracked, analyzed, and used to build a detailed profile of you. This data is then used to serve targeted ads and influence your online experience. iBrowe Search, on the other hand, is designed with privacy as its core principle:
GoogleComparison.privacyConclusion: While Google offers a comprehensive search experience, it comes at the cost of your privacy. iBrowe Search provides a private alternative that doesn't track your searches or collect your personal data, while still delivering relevant search results.
GoogleComparison.featuresTitle: Does iBrowe Search have more features than Google?
GoogleComparison.featuresDescription: While Google offers a wide range of features, many of them are designed to collect more data about you. iBrowe Search focuses on providing essential search features while protecting your privacy.

FirefoxComparison.title: iBrowe vs Firefox
FirefoxComparison.subtitle: Firefox is known for its privacy features and open-source nature. While it's a good browser, iBrowe offers additional privacy protections and a more streamlined experience.
FirefoxComparison.privacyTitle: Is iBrowe more private than Firefox?
FirefoxComparison.privacyDescription: Firefox has a strong focus on privacy and is open-source, which is great. However, iBrowe takes privacy protection to the next level with additional features and a more comprehensive approach to user privacy:
FirefoxComparison.privacyConclusion: While Firefox is a solid choice for privacy-conscious users, iBrowe provides even stronger privacy protections and a more streamlined experience. Both browsers are good choices, but iBrowe offers more comprehensive privacy features.
FirefoxComparison.featuresTitle: Does iBrowe have more features than Firefox?
FirefoxComparison.featuresDescription: Both Firefox and iBrowe prioritize privacy, but iBrowe offers additional features that enhance your browsing experience while maintaining strong privacy protections.

items.title: Man Uses AI to Apply for Jobs
items.content: A man claims to have used AI to apply for 1,000 jobs while sleeping, waking up to shocking results. People are divided in their opinions. A man on Reddit claims that his job search changed dramatically after creating an AI bot. This man revealed that the artificial intelligence bot he created made the job search process much easier. What's more special is that the AI bot worked hard for him while he slept comfortably in bed.

items.title: Using AI to Read News
items.content: The era of AI news anchors has arrived! Many countries have started using AI news anchors or incorporating them into their programs. Recently, it's Thailand's turn as Nation TV became the first in Thailand to use Natcha and Nichan, AI news anchors, in their news programs.

items.title: Fast in Usage
items.content: iBrowe uses modern and efficient web page rendering technology, such as the Chromium engine, which is the same foundation as other browsers like Google Chrome. However, iBrowe has improved its performance by reducing unnecessary resource usage.

items.title: Fast in Usage
items.content: iBrowe uses modern and efficient web page rendering technology, such as the Chromium engine, which is the same foundation as other browsers like Google Chrome. However, iBrowe has improved its performance by reducing unnecessary resource usage.

faqs.question: What is iBrowe?
faqs.answer: iBrowe is a modern web browser designed to provide a faster, safer, and more efficient browsing experience. It combines powerful features with a user-friendly interface to enhance your online activities.

faqs.question: Is iBrowe free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, iBrowe is completely free to download and use. We believe in providing a high-quality browsing experience without any cost to our users.

faqs.question: How is iBrowe different from other browsers?
faqs.answer: iBrowe stands out with its unique features like advanced privacy protection, faster page loading, smart search capabilities, and a user-friendly interface. We focus on providing a seamless browsing experience while prioritizing user privacy and security.

faqs.question: Can I import my bookmarks from other browsers?
faqs.answer: Yes, iBrowe allows you to easily import your bookmarks, history, and other data from popular browsers like Chrome, Firefox, and Edge. The import process is simple and straightforward.

faqs.question: Is iBrowe available for mobile devices?
faqs.answer: Currently, iBrowe is available for desktop platforms (Windows, macOS, and Linux). We are working on mobile versions and will announce their release soon.

faqs.question: How does iBrowe protect my privacy?
faqs.answer: iBrowe includes built-in privacy features such as ad blocking, tracker blocking, and secure browsing. We also don't collect or store your personal browsing data, ensuring your online activities remain private.

faqs.question: Can I customize iBrowe's appearance?
faqs.answer: Yes, iBrowe offers various customization options including themes, layouts, and toolbar configurations. You can personalize your browsing experience to match your preferences.

faqs.question: Does iBrowe support extensions?
faqs.answer: Yes, iBrowe supports a wide range of extensions and add-ons. You can enhance your browsing experience by installing extensions from our secure extension store.

faqs.question: How often is iBrowe updated?
faqs.answer: We regularly release updates to improve performance, add new features, and enhance security. Updates are automatic and can be installed with a single click.

faqs.question: How can I get support if I have issues?
faqs.answer: Our support team is available through multiple channels including email, live chat, and our community forum. We're committed to helping you resolve any issues quickly and efficiently.

AboutSection.subtitle: About Us
AboutSection.title: Introducing iBrowe - Technology for an Exceptional Browsing Experience!
AboutSection.description: iBrowe is not just an ordinary browser, but a powerful tool designed to support growing brands and tech-savvy users. With cutting-edge features tailored for performance, iBrowe guarantees smooth and fast navigation. Similar to the development of the printing industry, iBrowe has become the new standard in web browsing technology, built to meet the needs of the digital age. Enhance your online journey with advanced Search Engine Optimization capabilities that provide accurate and lightning-fast results, keeping you ahead in the digital world!

Footer.tagline: A Browser That Saves Your Time — Not Your Personal Data.

hero.title: iBrowe Browser Privacy Policy
hero.description: This Privacy Policy explains how iBrowe Software collects, uses, and protects information from users of the iBrowe browser. It reflects our commitment to privacy by design and ensures full compliance with global privacy regulations such as GDPR and CCPA.

overview.title: 1. Overview
overview.content: iBrowe is a browser designed to protect user privacy by default. It blocks tracking and unwanted ads, and this policy applies to the use of the iBrowe browser and related features such as iBrowe Shields and iBrowe Rewards. We aim to minimize personal data collection and rely on privacy-preserving mechanisms like on-device processing.

dataCollection.title: 2. Data We Collect
dataCollection.intro: iBrowe collects limited information, categorized as follows:

userInfo.title: Information Provided by Users:
userInfo.rewards: iBrowe Rewards: If you opt in to iBrowe Rewards (to view ads and earn iBrowe Attention Tokens or "iBOW"), you may be asked to provide information such as an email address for linking a crypto wallet.
userInfo.account: iBrowe Account: Email or subscription details (e.g., for iBrowe Premium).
userInfo.contact: Contacting iBrowe: Such as email content sent to our support team.

autoInfo.title: Automatically Collected Information:
autoInfo.usage: Usage Data: Anonymous data on how the browser functions, such as feature usage and button clicks.
autoInfo.statistics: Statistics: For example, the number of ads blocked by iBrowe Shields.
autoInfo.crash: Crash Reports: Only if you opt in, crash data is sent anonymously (no IP or personal info).
autoInfo.rewards: iBrowe Rewards and Ads: Ad interaction data is processed on-device. Tipping data is anonymized.

dataUse.title: 3. Purpose of Data Use
dataUse.content: To enhance browser performance and features, facilitate the operation of iBrowe Rewards and iBrowe Ads (e.g., managing BAT rewards), and conduct anonymized data analysis to support product development. We also use data to respond to user requests, such as providing customer support. iBrowe limits data collection to what is strictly necessary and avoids sharing personally identifiable information.

dataSharing.title: 4. Data Sharing
dataSharing.intro: iBrowe shares data only in limited and specific circumstances:
dataSharing.providers: Service Providers: We work with trusted partners who are contractually obligated to adhere to strict privacy and data protection standards.
dataSharing.legal: Legal Requirements: We may disclose data when required to comply with a valid legal process.
dataSharing.rewards: iBrowe Rewards: Certain information necessary for processing rewards may be shared with authorized partners.
dataSharing.noSell: iBrowe does not sell your personal information under any circumstances.

dataRetention.title: 5. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain personal data only as long as needed to provide services. Anonymized data may be stored longer for analytics. Users may request deletion of their personal data at any time.

userRights.title: 6. User Rights
userRights.content: You may access, correct, delete, or transfer your data, and object to its processing under laws like GDPR and CCPA. EU users may contact their local authority. Reach us at

security.title: 7. Security
security.content: iBrowe uses security measures such as encryption and access controls. Most data is processed locally to reduce the risk of exposure.

privacyFeatures.title: 8. Privacy Features
privacyFeatures.content: iBrowe blocks ads and trackers, prevents third-party tracking, offers reward-based private ads, and supports anonymous browsing with Tor mode.

privacySettings.title: 9. Privacy Settings
privacySettings.content: Users can customize settings such as disabling anonymous usage metrics, adjusting iBrowe Shields (Standard or Aggressive), and more via Settings > Privacy and Security.

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.content: For questions about this policy, contact us at

policyUpdates.title: 11. Policy Updates
policyUpdates.content: iBrowe may update this policy from time to time and will notify users via our website or other channels. The latest version takes effect upon publication.

privacyCommitment.title: Our Privacy Commitment
privacyCommitment.content: At iBrowe, our policy is not to collect personal data unless it is strictly necessary to provide our services or to comply with specific legal obligations. We do not buy or sell consumer personal information.

informed.title: 1. Right to Be Informed
informed.content: You have the right to know what personal data we collect, how we use it, and your associated rights.

access.title: 2. Right of Access
access.content: If we process your personal data, you may request a copy of that data.

erasure.title: 3. Right to Erasure
erasure.content: Under certain conditions, you may request that we delete your personal data.

rectification.title: 4. Right to Rectification
rectification.content: You may request that we correct inaccurate or incomplete personal data.

restrict.title: 5. Right to Restrict Processing
restrict.content: In certain situations, you may request that we suspend processing your data.

object.title: 6. Right to Object
object.content: In specific cases, you may object to our processing of your data.

portability.title: 7. Right to Data Portability
portability.content: Where applicable, you may request to receive your data in a structured, commonly used, machine-readable format.

ChromeComparison.title: iBrowe vs Chrome
ChromeComparison.subtitle: See why iBrowe is better than Chrome in every aspect - privacy, speed, and security

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.ibrowe: iBrowe has automatic tracking protection and ad blocking, with no user data collection
privacy.chrome: Chrome collects usage data and browsing history to serve targeted advertisements

speed.title: Speed
speed.ibrowe: Faster with ad and tracker blocking, loading web pages up to 3x faster
speed.chrome: Web page loading speed is reduced due to loading numerous ads and trackers

resources.title: Resource Usage
resources.ibrowe: Uses less RAM and CPU as it doesn't need to process ads and trackers
resources.chrome: Uses more system resources due to processing ads and trackers

security.title: Security
security.ibrowe: Advanced malware and tracking protection with secure data encryption
security.chrome: Basic malware protection but still allows third-party tracking

wallet.title: iBrowe Wallet
wallet.subtitle: A secure built-in crypto wallet. Power up your browser and unlock the world of Web3 with no limits.
wallet.activate: Activate it in settings or simply click the wallet icon in your toolbar to get started.

simplify.title: Simplify crypto.
simplify.description: Manage your tokens and NFTs without switching between apps or extensions. All the power of a leading browser wallet built in, secure, and effortless.

explore.title: Explore the world of Web3
explore.description: Connect to DApps with iBrowe Wallet and unlock a whole new web experience. Join decentralized communities, buy and sell NFTs, explore DeFi, social platforms, and games and discover everything Web3 has to offer.

newWallet.title: A new kind of crypto wallet.
newWallet.description: Most crypto wallets rely on limited in-app browsers to access Web3 often compromising on performance, privacy, or security. iBrowe is different. It's not just a wallet. It's a fully private browser and a world-class crypto wallet built into one seamless experience. No trade-offs. No limits. Just full freedom to browse, transact, and connect with Web3 securely, privately, and effortlessly.

allInOne.title: Do more with your wallet. All in one place.
allInOne.description: No more switching apps or jumping between websites. Buy crypto instantly with your credit card, bank transfer, or other payment methods all within the same app. Fast, secure, and effortless. Real-time market insights. Stay on top of the crypto market with live prices, comparisons, and trending coin rankings powered by CoinGecko, trusted by investors worldwide. NFTs, beautifully organized. View and manage your NFTs across multiple blockchains including Ethereum, Polygon, and more in a single, elegant multichain gallery designed for simplicity and control.

easySetup.title: Easy to set up. Ready on every device.
easySetup.description: iBrowe Wallet works seamlessly across smartphones, tablets, and desktops. Whether it's your first crypto wallet or your fifth, creating a new account or importing an existing one takes just a few simple steps. Start using iBrowe Wallet instantly and connect to the world of Web3 with ease, security, and confidence on any device you choose.

comparison.title: How does iBrowe Wallet compare to other wallets?

features.crossPlatform: Seamlessly works across desktop and mobile
features.solanaSupport: Buy, store, send, and connect to DApps on Solana
features.ethereumSupport: Buy, store, send, and connect to DApps on Ethereum and EVM-compatible chains
features.filecoinSupport: Buy, store, and send FIL on the Filecoin network
features.solanaDex: Built-in DEX aggregator for token swaps on Solana
features.ethereumDex: Integrated DEX aggregator for seamless swaps on Ethereum and EVM networks

hero.title: Terms of Use
hero.description: Please read these Terms of Use ("Agreement" or "Terms of Use") carefully before using the services provided by 108plaza Co., Ltd. ("iBrowe"). This Agreement sets forth the legally binding terms and conditions for your use of the iBrowe Web Browser and all related services.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using iBrowe's services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use, including all applicable rules, policies, and any additional conditions introduced by iBrowe. iBrowe reserves the right to deny service at its sole discretion and to modify terms or eligibility criteria at any time. Any provision deemed unlawful in a specific jurisdiction shall be inapplicable within that jurisdiction.

modifications.title: Modifications to Terms
modifications.content: iBrowe reserves the right to amend or replace these Terms of Use, and to modify, suspend, or discontinue the Services (including, without limitation, features, databases, or content) at any time, with or without notice, by posting updates on its website or notifying you via email. iBrowe may impose restrictions on certain features or limit access to parts or all of the Services without liability. You are responsible for reviewing the Terms periodically. Continued use of the Services after any changes constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.

otherPolicies.title: Other Policies
otherPolicies.content: For information on how iBrowe handles personal data, please refer to the iBrowe Privacy Policy at https://ibrowe.com/ibrowe-privacy. If you believe that content or materials available through the Services infringe copyright, please consult iBrowe's Copyright Dispute Policy located at the end of these Terms of Use.

license.title: License Agreement for iBrowe Browser
license.content: You may use the iBrowe Browser executable code under the following terms:
license.openSource: Portions of the iBrowe Browser source code are licensed under open-source licenses and are available at: https://github.com/yuthstyle88/ibrowe-core
license.rights: This Agreement does not limit your rights under applicable open-source licenses for components covered by those terms.
license.intellectualProperty: Under this Agreement, iBrowe grants you a personal, non-exclusive license to install and use the browser software. No intellectual property rights are transferred except as explicitly stated.
license.termination: If you violate this Agreement, your license to use the iBrowe Browser will terminate immediately without notice, and you must delete or destroy all copies of the software in your possession.

rules.title: Rules and Conduct
rules.content: By using our Services, you agree not to use them for any unlawful purpose or in violation of these Terms of Use. The term "Content" refers to all forms of data, including personal information, text, images, videos, software, scripts, graphics, or interactive features created, provided, or accessible through our Services.

prohibited.title: Prohibited conduct includes, but is not limited to:
prohibited.laws: Violating applicable laws, regulations, or rules
prohibited.copyright: Infringing on copyrights, patents, or other intellectual property rights
prohibited.harassment: Threatening, harassing, defaming, deceiving, or invading the privacy of others
prohibited.content: Distributing offensive, obscene, or inappropriate content
prohibited.spam: Sending spam, unauthorized advertisements, or bulk emails

restrictions.title: In addition, you must not (directly or indirectly):
restrictions.load: Engage in activities that place an unreasonable load on iBrowe's systems or infrastructure
restrictions.disruption: Attempt to disrupt or interfere with the normal operation of the Services
restrictions.security: Bypass or interfere with security measures intended to restrict access to the Services

trademarks.title: Trademarks and Patents
trademarks.content: All iBrowe logos, marks, and designations are trademarks or registered trademarks of 108plaza Co., Ltd. Other trademarks mentioned on this website are the property of their respective owners. The trademarks and logos displayed on this website may not be used without the prior written consent of iBrowe or the respective rights holders. The components, features, and/or functionalities of iBrowe products may be protected under pending or granted patents owned by iBrowe.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: iBrowe may terminate your access to all or part of the Services at any time if you fail to comply with these Terms of Use, which may result in the forfeiture and deletion of all data associated with your account. Either party may terminate the Services at any time, for any reason, with written notice. You may cancel your account by following the instructions provided within the Services. Any fees paid are non-refundable. Upon termination, all rights and licenses granted to you under this Agreement will immediately cease. However, provisions that by their nature should survive termination such as disclaimers, indemnity, and limitations of liability will remain in effect.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: Your use of the Services and any content is entirely at your own risk. The Services (including, but not limited to, the iBrowe Browser and all content) are provided "as is" and "as available," without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. This includes, but is not limited to, implied warranties of title, non-infringement, merchantability, and fitness for a particular purpose, as well as any warranties arising from course of dealing or usage of trade all of which are expressly disclaimed. Some jurisdictions do not allow limitations on the duration of implied warranties, so the above limitations may not apply to you.

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless iBrowe, its affiliates, and their employees, contractors, directors, suppliers, and agents from and against any and all liabilities, losses, claims, and expenses (including reasonable attorneys' fees) arising out of or related to: (1) your use or misuse of, or access to, the Services; or (2) your violation of these Terms of Use, applicable laws, contracts, policies, regulations, or other obligations. iBrowe reserves the right, at its own expense, to assume the exclusive defense and control of any matter otherwise subject to indemnification by you, in which case you agree to cooperate fully with iBrowe in asserting any available defenses.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: In no event shall iBrowe, or its directors, employees, agents, partners, suppliers, or content providers, be liable under contract, tort, strict liability, negligence, or any other legal or equitable theory with respect to the Services for:
limitation.damages: any lost profits, loss of data, cost of procurement of substitute goods or services, or any special, indirect, incidental, punitive, or consequential damages of any kind
limitation.direct: any direct damages exceeding (in the aggregate) the fees you paid for the Services, or $100, whichever is greater

miscellaneous.title: Miscellaneous
miscellaneous.content: These Terms of Use constitute the entire agreement between you and iBrowe regarding the Services and supersede all prior or contemporaneous communications and proposals (whether oral, written, or electronic) between you and iBrowe. If any provision of these Terms is held to be unenforceable or invalid, that provision shall be limited or eliminated to the minimum extent necessary so that the remaining Terms remain in full force and effect. The failure of either party to enforce any right or provision shall not be deemed a waiver of future enforcement. iBrowe shall not be liable for any failure to perform its obligations due to causes beyond its reasonable control. These Terms are personal to you and may not be assigned or transferred without prior written consent from iBrowe. iBrowe may assign or transfer its rights and obligations without restriction. No agency, partnership, joint venture, or employment relationship is created as a result of these Terms, and neither party has authority to bind the other in any respect. All notices under these Terms must be in writing and shall be deemed properly delivered when received if delivered in person or by registered mail with confirmation of receipt; upon confirmation if sent by fax or email; or two days after dispatch if sent via recognized overnight courier.

copyright.title: Copyright Dispute Policy
copyright.content: The Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA") provides recourse for copyright owners who believe that material appearing on the Internet infringes their rights under U.S. copyright law. If you believe in good faith that content available through the Services infringes your copyright, you (or your agent) may send us a written notice requesting the removal of, or the blocking of access to, the infringing material, as outlined below. For more information, please visit https://www.copyright.gov/.

policy.title: It is iBrowe's policy to:
policy.block: block access to or remove content that it believes in good faith to be unlawfully copied and distributed by advertisers, affiliates, content providers, members, or users
policy.terminate: terminate the accounts of repeat infringers

procedure.title: Procedure for Reporting Copyright Infringement
procedure.signature: A physical or electronic signature of a person authorized to act on behalf of the copyright owner whose rights are allegedly infringed
procedure.identification: Identification of the copyrighted work or material claimed to have been infringed
procedure.location: Identification of the allegedly infringing content, including information reasonably sufficient to permit iBrowe to locate the material and verify its existence (e.g., URL or detailed location information)
procedure.contact: Contact information for the complaining party, including a physical address, telephone number, and, if available, an email address
procedure.statement: A statement that the complaining party has a good faith belief that the use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law
procedure.accuracy: A statement, made under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that the complaining party is authorized to act on behalf of the copyright owner

response.title: Upon Receipt of a Valid Infringement Notice
response.remove: Remove or disable access to the infringing content
response.notify: Notify the content provider, member, or user whose content has been removed or disabled
response.terminate: In the case of repeat offenders, remove the infringing content from the system and terminate access to the Services for the content provider, member, or user in question

counter.title: Procedure for Submitting a Counter-Notification
counter.signature: A physical or electronic signature of the content provider, member, or user
counter.identification: Identification of the content that was removed or to which access was disabled, and the location at which the content appeared before it was removed or disabled
counter.statement: A statement under good faith belief that the content was removed or disabled as a result of mistake or misidentification
counter.contact: The name, address, telephone number, and, if available, email address of the content provider, member, or user, along with a statement that such person or entity consents to the jurisdiction of the federal court located in the district of their address, or if the address is outside of Thailand, the courts in the jurisdiction where iBrowe is located, and that such person or entity will accept service of process from the person who submitted the original infringement notice

hero.title: iBrowe – A Browser That Protects You and Inspires Innovation
hero.description:
Advanced security meets unlimited creativity, step into the online world with a browser built just for you.
💡⚔️ iBrowe protects your privacy at every step by blocking smart trackers and stripping hidden tracking parameters from links.
🛡️ Browse anonymously with Tor-powered Private Windows for true confidentiality. Enjoy a modern interface packed with powerful tools designed for creators and developers.
🚀 Experience fast, smooth, and stable browsing with no compromises between speed and security. iBrowe is the new choice for those bold enough to reshape the digital world.
Download it for free today and discover how true freedom starts with owning your browser.

shields.title: 🛡️ Shields – Intelligent Protection Built into iBrowe
shields.description:
Shields is a core feature that sets iBrowe apart from ordinary browsers. It acts as a built-in defense layer that works right out of the box, no extensions needed. By default, Shields protects you from intrusive ads, cross-site trackers, digital fingerprinting, cross-site tracking cookies, and many other online threats.
You can fully customize how Shields works to fit your preferences—or just keep it in "protect immediately" mode for instant security with zero setup.
iBrowe Shields: security you control, click by click. Manage your Shields settings anytime at ibrowe://settings/shields.

rewards.title: iBrowe Rewards – Earn Rewards While Protecting Your Privacy
rewards.description:
Simply enable iBrowe Rewards and start earning IAT (iBrowe Attention Token) by viewing ads that fully respect your privacy.
🪙 Earn IAT every time you engage with privacy-preserving ads
🤝 Use your IAT to support your favorite content creators
🎁 Redeem IAT for gift cards, digital assets, and other exciting rewards.
Start earning safely and privately today at https://ibrowe.com/ibrowe-rewards/

wallet.title: iBrowe Wallet – A Digital Wallet You Fully Control
wallet.description:
iBrowe Wallet is a fully self-custody crypto wallet that puts you in complete control, no external extensions or extra installs needed.
Everything is built right into the iBrowe browser.
🔐 Secured at the browser level
🪪 Your "passport" to the world of Web3
💼 Supports digital assets, NFTs, and seamless App integration
🛡️ Designed with maximum privacy and security in mind.
Start creating your wallet today at 👉 ibrowe://wallet/

news.title: 📜 iBrowe News – News You Choose, Without the Tracking
news.description:
Discover a customizable news feed on your homepage, tailored just for you with no tracking and zero intrusive ads, so you can enjoy a truly private reading experience.
📰 Choose the categories and sources that matter most to you
🔍 No behavior-tracking algorithms involved
⚡ Fast-loading, ad-free interface
Getting started is simple: just open a new tab in iBrowe and scroll down to see your personalized news.
Want to learn more about iBrowe News the privacy-first news experience?
👉 Stay tuned for updates.

playlist.title: 🎶 iBrowe Playlist – Save the Content You Love for Later
playlist.description:
Create your personal playlist from your favorite videos or audio directly within the iBrowe browser and enjoy them anytime even offline.
🎵 Collect all your favorite content in one convenient place, whether it's video or audio from various websites.
🚫 No ads will interrupt your playback when offline, making it perfect for rewatching, rereading, or organizing content to enjoy later.
On iOS, just visit a page with the video or audio you want, then tap the "Add to Playlist" icon to save it instantly.

moreFeatures.title: Plus Many More Features

privacy.title: 🔐 Enhanced Privacy and Security
privacy.description: 🌐 Tor Private Window – Browse Without a Trace. iBrowe integrates Tor (The Onion Router) to give you true online privacy by effectively hiding your IP address, preventing tracking from websites, third parties, and even your internet service provider. It also lets you access websites blocked or restricted in certain regions. Just open a Tor Private Window in iBrowe, and your traffic will automatically route through the Tor network, letting you browse the web without leaving a trace. With iBrowe, you're in full control of your privacy empowering your freedom online.

customization.title: 🎯 Customize Your Browsing Experience
customization.description: 🧭 Smart Sidebar Everything Within Reach. iBrowe offers quick access to essential features through a Smart Sidebar designed for convenience and efficiency, giving you instant entry to your favorite websites, a neatly organized Reading List and bookmarks, plus easy activation of unique tools like privacy features, VPN, or AdBlock. Whether you're working, researching, or relaxing, the iBrowe sidebar keeps you in control without breaking your flow browse your way with a sidebar thoughtfully built just for you.

accessibility.title: 🌍 Accessibility and Usability Tools
accessibility.description: 🌐 Built-in Translation With iBrowe's integrated page translation, you can instantly read content from around the world without relying on external services that may track your data, ensuring enhanced privacy as no data is sent to third-party servers, while enjoying seamless multilingual support to access articles, news, or international websites with a single click, all translated instantly within the browser itself for a fast, private, and effortless experience. iBrowe gives you the freedom to understand any language while fully respecting your privacy.

fingerprint.title: 🕵️ Fingerprint Randomization
fingerprint.description: Automatically protect your identity from online tracking with iBrowe's Fingerprint Randomization technology. By constantly randomizing key fingerprint data like screen size, operating system, fonts, and more each time you visit a website, iBrowe makes you appear as a brand-new user every time. This stealthy process runs quietly in the background, preventing websites from profiling or tracking you across the web without interfering with your browsing. No matter where you go online, iBrowe ensures your digital fingerprint remains untraceable, keeping your privacy secure and intact.

sync.title: 🔄 Sync Across Devices
sync.description:
Secure and Private with End-to-End Encryption
iBrowe Sync lets you effortlessly synchronize your essential data across all your devices while keeping it fully protected with end-to-end encryption.
🔐 Your data stays private and invisible to everyone, including iBrowe itself. Sync bookmarks, passwords, open tabs, browsing history, and more seamlessly across mobile, tablet, and desktop devices. Just set up Sync with your unique passphrase, and enjoy a secure, consistent browsing experience anytime, anywhere.
iBrowe Sync seamless security across all your devices.

speedreader.title: ⚡ Speedreader
speedreader.description:
📖 Read Faster With Zero Distractions
iBrowe Speedreader is a special reading mode that strips away clutter and boosts page loading speed:
📄 Blocks ads, pop-ups, and other distractions
🚀 Loads just the main content quickly saving data, perfect for mobile users
👁️ Keeps your focus on what matters, like articles, news, or blog posts
It's not only easier on your eyes but also saves battery life and mobile data.
iBrowe Speedreader for a cleaner, faster reading experience anytime, anywhere.

cookie.title: 🍪 Cookie Consent Blocking
cookie.description:
Browse Websites Without Annoying Cookie Pop-Ups
iBrowe makes your browsing smoother by automatically hiding or blocking those persistent cookie consent banners you see on nearly every site:
🚫 Automatically blocks or hides consent pop-ups
💬 No more clicking "Accept" again and again
🔒 Keeps your privacy intact without interruptions
Say goodbye to distracting cookie banners and stay fully focused on what matters the content.
With iBrowe, browse quietly and seamlessly, no manual closing required.

verticalTabs.title: 📚 Vertical Tabs
verticalTabs.description:
Efficient Tab Management Everything Neatly Organized
iBrowe's Vertical Tabs help you manage your browsing smarter and more systematically:
📌 Pin important tabs for instant access
🗂️ Group tabs by topic, project, or theme
🧰 Use powerful tools like drag-to-reorder, drag-to-detach, and hide tab groups.
No matter how many tabs you have open, iBrowe's vertical tab system keeps your workspace tidy so you always find what you need, fast.
Simple, intuitive, and designed to help you conquer tab chaos.

wayback.title: 🕰️ Wayback Integration
wayback.description:
Access Lost Web Pages Even When You Hit a 404 Error
Encounter a "404 – Page Not Found"? No worries. iBrowe automatically searches for archived versions of missing pages using the Wayback Machine:
🔍 Finds previous snapshots of unavailable pages
🕸️ Lets you browse archived copies stored in the Internet Archive
⚙️ Works seamlessly and automatically no setup needed
When content disappears, iBrowe helps you retrieve it effortlessly.
iBrowe + Wayback Machine Rediscover pages that seem lost forever.

mobilePrivacy.title: 🔐 Mobile Privacy Center
mobilePrivacy.description:
Monitor Your Protection All in One Place
iBrowe's Privacy Dashboard gives you real-time insight into your online defenses:
🚫 See how many ads and trackers Shields has blocked automatically
🔍 Dive into details about what each website tried to load and how iBrowe kept you safe
📱 Mobile-friendly design lets you check protection stats easily on any device
Plus, you can tweak your protection settings instantly from this handy control panel tailoring your browsing security exactly how you want it.
iBrowe Shields Quietly working in the background, with transparency you can trust.

extensions.title: 🧩 Extensions
extensions.description:
🧩 Supports Everything You Need Straight from the Chrome Web Store
iBrowe fully supports browser extensions, so you can customize your browsing experience exactly how you like:
✅ Fully compatible with extensions from the Chrome Web Store
🔄 Supports both Manifest V2 and V3 including older extensions that haven't yet updated
🛠️ Ideal for everyday users and developers wanting to enhance browser capabilities
Whether it's ad blockers, password managers, or advanced developer tools, iBrowe has you covered.
Unlock your full potential with thousands of extensions all without switching browsers.

ipfs.title: 🌐 IPFS Integration
ipfs.description:
Access Decentralized Content Directly from Your Browser
iBrowe comes with built-in support for IPFS (InterPlanetary File System), letting you access information without relying on centralized servers:
🔗 Open IPFS URIs (ipfs://, ipns://) directly in the browser
📦 Access files, documents, and decentralized apps from the IPFS network, no need for external gateways
🛡️ Enjoy safe, censorship-resistant content that can't be deleted or blocked because it lives on the distributed network
With iBrowe, step into the Web3 world and explore content that never disappears. Access information freely without any central control thanks to IPFS integration.

moreFeatures.summary:
iBrowe Delivers All You Expect from a Modern Browser
From autofill and secure password storage with its built-in password manager, to an intelligent import tool that makes switching from your previous browser seamless
iBrowe offers convenience and security right out of the box.

adsReplace.question: Do iBrowe Ads Replace Website Ads?
adsReplace.answer:
No — iBrowe Ads do not replace or inject ads into websites.
By default, iBrowe blocks all intrusive ads, including:
– 🚫 Annoying banners
– 🚫 Pop-ups
– 🚫 Ads that track your behavior across the web
📢 So, What Are iBrowe Ads?
iBrowe Ads are privacy-respecting, user-controlled ads that appear separately from the websites you visit. You choose to view them and you get rewarded for doing so.
You can select from ad formats such as:
🔹 Image cards on your New Tab page
🔹 Non-intrusive push notifications
🔹 Deals and offers in the iBrowe News feed
🔹 And much more all without interrupting your browsing experience
✨ This is a new kind of ad, one that respects your privacy and rewards your attention.
🧱 Powered by Open Source. Built for Privacy.
iBrowe, a privacy-first browser built on Chromium (the same engine used by Chrome, Edge, and Vivaldi),
takes things a step further:
🔐 We remove unnecessary tracking features
🔧 We customize each Chromium update to strip out invasive code
🎯 Our goal: maximum privacy and fair rewards, by design.

platforms.question: Which Platforms Support iBrowe Rewards?
platforms.answer:
iBrowe Rewards is available across multiple platforms,
so you can earn while browsing without limits.
✅ Fully Supported on:
- Windows
- macOS
- Android
Just use iBrowe, enable the Rewards feature, and start earning IAT (iBrowe Attention Token) by viewing safe, privacy-respecting ads.
🍎 On iOS Devices:
Due to iOS system limitations, iBrowe Rewards is currently limited to content creator support only.
While you can't earn IAT from viewing ads on iOS yet, you can still send IAT to your favorite websites and creators directly and transparently.
⚙️ System Requirements:
– Secure internet connection
– An iBrowe ID account to manage your IAT wallet
– iBrowe Ads enabled to start receiving rewards
💸 Get started with iBrowe Rewards today
it's simple, secure, and turns your browsing into real value.

activate.question: How Do I Activate iBrowe Rewards?
activate.answer:
Getting started with iBrowe Rewards is quick and easy in just a few clicks, you can begin earning IAT (iBrowe Attention Token) right away.
📍 For Desktop or Android Users:
- Open the iBrowe browser
- Tap or click the IAT icon 🪙 near the address bar
- Select "Activate iBrowe Rewards"
Follow the steps to create a wallet or connect an existing account
Once activated, iBrowe will begin showing privacy-respecting ads based on your chosen preferences and you'll start earning IAT every time you engage.
📱 For iOS Users:
While earning IAT from ads is not currently supported on iOS (due to platform restrictions),
you can still use iBrowe Rewards to support your favorite websites and creators directly.
✨ Activate iBrowe Rewards today and turn your browsing into real value.
Take full control of what you see, protect your privacy, and earn fair rewards in return.

earn.question: How Do I Earn Rewards with iBrowe?
earn.answer:
If you'd like to start earning IAT (iBrowe Attention Tokens) from viewing ads through iBrowe Ads,
just follow the simple steps below to set up your account and start collecting rewards.
✅ Getting Started is Easy:
1. Activate iBrowe Rewards
– Click the IAT icon in the address bar
– Follow the instructions to enable Rewards
2. Connect a Payment Account
– Choose a supported wallet provider such as Uphold, Bitkub, or any Web3 wallet
– Sign in and authorize the connection to iBrowe Rewards
3. Start Earning IAT Instantly
– View privacy-respecting ads
– Automatically collect IAT tokens in your connected account
💡 Why Do I Need to Link a Payment Account?
Connecting a payment account ensures that iBrowe can securely and transparently deliver the IAT you earn.
You'll also be able to withdraw, exchange, or use your tokens however you choose.
🔐 iBrowe Rewards = Rewards You Control, With Privacy You Can Trust.

iat.question: What Can I Do with IAT?
iat.answer:
IAT (iBrowe Attention Token) is the digital token you earn by using iBrowe and here's everything you can do with it:
🎁 1. Redeem Gift Cards
Connect with our partner networks like TAP Network, and use your IAT to redeem gift cards from top global brands.
🛍️ Check out the full selection at iBrowe Marketplace or TAP.

🌐 2. Spend IAT in Web3 DApps
- Use IAT to purchase goods, services, or make transactions in decentralized applications (DApps)
– Fully compatible with NFT marketplaces, GameFi platforms, and other Web3 ecosystems

❤️ 3. Support the Creators You Love
– Send IAT directly to websites or creators you follow
– A transparent, direct support system with no middlemen

💱 4. Exchange for Other Currencies
– Convert IAT to fiat currencies or other cryptocurrencies
– Transfer to your Web3 wallet for storage, investment, or trading
✨ IAT gives you freedom, flexibility, and real value all while protecting your privacy.

withdraw.question: How Do I Withdraw My IAT Rewards?
withdraw.answer:
As you use iBrowe Ads and accumulate IAT (iBrowe Attention Tokens) through the iBrowe Rewards system,
you can easily withdraw your tokens automatically, every month.
✅ How to Withdraw Your IAT Rewards:
1. Connect a Payment Account
– Use a supported digital wallet such as Uphold, Bitkub, MetaMask, or other Web3 wallets
– Sign in and authorize the connection to iBrowe Rewards
2. Receive IAT Automatically
– Your ad earnings are transferred monthly to your connected wallet
– No hidden fees, with full access to your transaction history
3. Manage Your Tokens Freely
– Transfer, exchange, or spend your IAT in Web3 DApps, marketplaces, or NFT platforms
– Or convert your tokens into your preferred currencies such as THB, USD, ETH, BTC, and more
🔐 Secure, Transparent, and Fully Yours
With iBrowe, you own your tokens, no third-party tracking, no restrictions.

controlAds.question: Can I Control the Frequency of iBrowe Ads?
controlAds.answer:
Absolutely!
iBrowe Ads are designed to give you 100% control over your browsing experience including how often ads appear.
⚙️ Here's What You Can Do:
🔹 Turn Off Specific Ad Formats
– Don't want to see image cards on the New Tab page or offers in the news feed?
– You can disable specific ad formats directly from your ad settings menu.
🔹 Set Push Notification Frequency
– Choose how many push notification ads you want to receive per hour
– Set anywhere from 1 to 10 ads per hour, or turn them off completely
📍 Go to:
Settings > iBrowe Rewards > Ads
to customize your preferences anytime.
✨ Browse freely, stay in control, and only get rewarded when you want to.

creators.question: Who Are Content Creators — and Are They Different from Publishers?
creators.answer:
In the iBrowe Rewards ecosystem:
🎨 Content Creators
"Content Creators" are individuals or groups who create and share their own content across platforms such as:
– YouTube
– Twitch
– X (formerly Twitter)
– Reddit
– Personal blogs
– Or any other public-facing channels
📰 Publishers
"Publishers" typically refer to companies or organizations that distribute content via their own websites, such as:
– News outlets (e.g., The New York Times, TechCrunch)
– Commercial content platforms
– Corporate or organizational media sites
✅ Both Content Creators and Publishers can join iBrowe Rewards
They are eligible to receive IAT (iBrowe Attention Tokens) directly from users who wish to support them transparently, fairly, and without middlemen.

revenue.question: How Does iBrowe Share Ad Revenue with Users?
revenue.answer:
At iBrowe, we believe you — not Big Tech —
should directly benefit from your browsing experience.
That's why we share ad revenue with you, not just keep it for ourselves.
📊 Your Revenue Share
You can earn up to 70% of the revenue generated from privacy-respecting ads shown through iBrowe.
💎 Payout in IAT
Your earnings are paid out in IAT (iBrowe Attention Tokens) via the iBrowe Rewards system.
❤️ Keep It or Pay It Forward, You Decide
With your IAT, you can:
– 💼 Store it in your digital wallet
– 🎁 Redeem it for gift cards or convert to other currencies
– 🙌 Share a portion with websites or content creators you love (completely optional)
🔐 iBrowe = Transparent. Fair. User-First.
You're no longer the product
You're now the owner of your value, rewarded for what you choose to see.
